description: Ms. codex. Collective title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 15 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Leaf 18 detached. Marginal damp staining. Origin: Texts 1-2, 29 Ramaḍān 1254 H [16 December 1838] (leaf 49a). Texts 3-5, 9 Shawwāl 1254 H [26 December 1838] (leaf 89b). Texts 6-9 likely completed soon after.
abstract: Collection contains five treatises on the fundamental Islamic rituals by Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī, plus four additional texts.
contents: 1. leaves 1b-21b: [al-Ithná ʻasharīyah fī al-ṭahārah] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
2. leaves 22b-49a: [al-Ithná ʻasharīyah fī wājibāt al-ṣalāh al-yawmīyah] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
3. leaves 50b-65a: al-Ithná ʻasharīyah al-ṣawmīyah / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
4. leaves 66b-79a: [al-Ithná ʻasharīyah fī al-ḥajj] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
5. leaves 80b-89b: [al-Ithná ʻasharīyah fī al-zakāh wa-al-khums] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
6. leaves 89b-90a: Fī al-ḥadīth "al-ḥummām yawm wa-yawm lā yukthiru al-luḥam".
8. leaves 131a-135b: [Maṭlab 12 from Minhāj al-ḥaqq wa-al-yaqīn] / Walī Allāh ibn Niʻmat Allāh al-Ḥāʼirī.
9. leaves 136a-137b: Fī al-zakāh. Anonymous extract in four fuṣūl; text breaks off in the middle of the third faṣl.
extent: 138 leaves : paper ; 214 x 153 (142 x 88) mm bound to 214 x 158 mm

title.@value: هذه المجموعة محتوية على خمسة رسالة اثنى عشرية في ستة عبادات من العبادات الشرعية ...
Hādhihi al-majmūʻah muḥtawiyah ʻalá khamsat risālah ithná ʻasharīyah fī sittat ʻibādāt min al-ʻibādāt al-sharʻīyah ...

subject: Hadith—Commentaries
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
